abstract: In the worst month yet in a horrible year, U.S. sales fell 41 percent at General Motors and 33.9 percent at Toyota. Honda’s sales declined 31.6 percent, and Ford’s fell 30.6 percent.
snippet: In the worst month yet in a horrible year, U.S. sales fell 41 percent at General Motors and 33.9 percent at Toyota. Honda’s sales declined 31.6 percent, and Ford’s fell 30.6 percent.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT  The Big Three automakers are scrambling to adjust their businesses to the reality of the market. But that reality is turning harsher by the month.

headline.main: Another Month of Miserable Auto Sales
headline.print_headline: Another Month of Miserable Auto Sales
